activate.title: Account activation
activate.error: The activation email couldn't be sent because of an internal server error. Contact server admin
activate.emailSent: An email was sent to %s with a confirmation link ; click on it to activate your account
activate.spamCheck: Please check your spam if it doesn't appear in your inbox. If however, you've received nothing, refresh this page to send another one

index.visibility: This page is public and does not require an authentication to be loaded

index.headDesc: A tool that provides a basic user stack with roles for any kind of web app!

deleteUser.title: Delete user
deleteUser.content: You are about to remove this account from database. Warning, this is a one way action that will revoke your access to this app

errors.B_LOGIN_INVALID_FIELD: Data sent to the server does not contain a username and a password
errors.B_LOGIN_MISSING_FIELD: One or several fields are empty, please fill them all before submitting your login form
errors.B_LOGIN_USER_NOT_ACTIVE: User is not verified, therefore not active
errors.B_REGISTER_INVALID_FIELD: Data sent to the server does not contain a mandatory field in username, email, code, pass1 and pass2
errors.B_REGISTER_MISSING_FIELD: One or several field are empty, please fill them all before submitting your registration form
errors.B_REGISTER_DIFFERENT_PASSWORDS: The two provided passwords are not matching
errors.B_REGISTER_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least %s characters
errors.B_REGISTER_EXISTING_USERNAME_AND_EMAIL: Both username and email are taken in database
errors.B_REGISTER_INVALID_CODE: Register submission is refused because invite code is invalid
errors.B_REGISTER_EXISTING_USERNAME: %s username is already taken, please choose another one
errors.B_REGISTER_EXISTING_EMAIL: %s email is already taken, please choose another one
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_INVALID_FIELD: Data sent to the server does not contain a mandatory field in pass1, pass2 and pass3
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_EMPTY_FIELD: All password fields were sent empty to the server
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_DIFFERENT_PASS: The two provided passwords are not matching
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_SAME_PASSWORDS: Submitted password is the same as current password
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_PASSWORD_PASSWORD_TOO_S: Password must be at least %s characters
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_ROLE_INVALID_FIELD: Data sent to the server does not contain a mandatory field in userId, roleId and checked
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_ROLE_MISSING_FIELD: Missing user ID or role ID to update
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_ROLE_CANT_REMOVE_ADMIN_: Can't revoke admin role from root user
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_INFO_INVALID_FIELD: Data sent to the server does not contain a mandatory field in username and email
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_INFO_MISSING_FIELD: Missing username or email to update
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_INFO_NO_CHANGES: No changes provided to user information
errors.B_PROFILE_UPDATE_AVATAR_NOT_FOUND: User have not the avatar to update
errors.B_PROFILE_DELETE_AVATAR_NOT_FOUND: User have not the avatar to delete
errors.B_PROFILE_DELETE_AVATAR_UNLINK_ERROR: Unable to delete existing avatar from assets folder
errors.B_PROFILE_UPLOAD_AVATAR_SIZE_ERROR: Uploaded image can't exceed %s pixels for height/width
errors.B_PROFILE_UPLOAD_AVATAR_RENAME_ERROR: Unable to move temporary avatar to the avatar assets folder
errors.B_PROFILE_UPLOAD_AVATAR_UNLINK_ERROR: Unable to unlink avatar stored in temporary upload folder
errors.B_PROFILE_UPLOAD_AVATAR_UNSUPPORTED_FORM: Image sent to update avatar form is not a supported image
errors.B_USER_NOT_FOUND: Can not find user in database
errors.B_ROLE_NOT_FOUND: Can not find role in database
errors.B_AUTH_TOKEN_NOT_FOUND: Can not find auth token in database
errors.B_INVALID_FIELD: Provided form data is not matching the expected structure
errors.B_MISSING_FIELD: One or several field are empty, please fill them all before submitting your form
errors.B_NEVER_KILL_ROOT: Deleting the root account is not permitted
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_FIND: Database error when trying to find user in Users collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_SAVE: Database error when trying to save user in Users collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_COUNT: Database error when trying to count users in Users collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_USER_DELETE: Database error when trying to delete user in Users collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_ROLE_FIND: Database error when trying to find role in Roles collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_ROLE_SAVE: Database error when trying to save role in Roles collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_AUTH_TOKEN_FIND: Database error when trying to find auth token in AuthToken collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_AUTH_TOKEN_SAVE: Database error when trying to save auth token in AuthToken collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_AUTH_TOKEN_DELETE: Database error when trying to delete auth token in AuthToken collection
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_FILE_UPLOAD: An error occured when trying to save uploaded file to the server
errors.B_INTERNAL_ERROR_TEMPLATE_RENDERING: An error occurred when rendering the template as a string
